m_szDocTitle: Norway May Pull Back On Some EV Incentives - Gas 2
m_szDocSumamry: Norway May Pull Back On Some EV Incentives February 29th, 2016 by Steve Hanley     Updated March 1. Our contact in Norway advises that the following changes are part of a package of proposals that are under discussion. Our story yesterday indicated the changes had already been put into effect. The story has been amended in light of this new information.  Norway probably leads the world when it comes to EV incentives. That may be why sales of electric and plug-in hybrid cars have surged in the country recently. For one thing, cars with plugs are exempt from sales tax and VAT assessments. Norway
